comments:
This advanced course in entrepreneurship centers on writing a comprehensive business plan and implementation plan for a venture of your choice. The course examines ways to profitably launch and exploit business opportunities.

Students found the course interesting and helpful in creating a business plan. Nevertheless, several expressed the desire for more structure. One suggested that the course needs slides “that cover the core needs of a business plan.” Students also wished for more in class discussion.

Students agreed that Professor Gelburd is an excellent professor who is “funny, entertaining and very approachable.” Nearly all students praised his accessibility including teleconferences and sessions on Sunday afternoon. One appreciates that he “always goes beyond the requirements of an instructor” and helped students network through the class.

This course is offered to students in the Wharton Programs for Working Professionals. Most recommend the course and write that it has an “outstanding practical approach.”
